element.default:
Affordable, Excellent Condition. Crystal Black Pearl exterior and Parchment interior. Sunroof, Navigation, Heated Leather Seats, 3rd Row Seat, Power Liftgate, Rear Air, Alloy Wheels, All Wheel Drive, Non-Smoker vehicle.
KEY FEATURES INCLUDE Leather Seats, Third Row Seat, Navigation, Sunroof, All Wheel Drive, Power Liftgate, Rear Air, Heated Driver Seat, Back-Up Camera, Satellite Radio, iPod/MP3 Input, CD Player, Onboard Communications System, Aluminum Wheels, Dual Zone A/C. Rear Spoiler, MP3 Player, Keyless Entry, Privacy Glass, Remote Trunk Release. Acura Technology Pkg with Crystal Black Pearl exterior and Parchment interior features a V6 Cylinder Engine with 300 HP at 6300 RPM*. Non-Smoker vehicle.
EXPERTS ARE SAYING CarAndDriver.com's review says "Already a class leader, Acura's sporty SUV flagship gets several updates for 2010, including freshened styling, engine refinements, a new transmission, and suspension upgrades.". 5 Star Driver Front Crash Rating. 5 Star Driver Side Crash Rating.
BUY WITH CONFIDENCE 3-month/3,000 Mile Limited Powertrain Warranty, 24/7 Roadside Assistance, Rental Coverage: up to 3 days at $30 per day not to exceed $90 per occurrence, Trip Interruption Service: hotel, transportation, meal reimbursement, Multi-point Vehicle Inspection; detail mechanical inspection, CARFAX Vehicle History Report
element.label: Features
element.name: features
